title: Mercedes CEO: The V12 Isn’t Dead Yet — It’s Staying “Into the 2030s”
description: "I will not say more, but it's coming," Mercedes-Benz CEO Thomas Schäfer told Autocar. Mercedes-Benz confirmed it will keep its big V12 engine in production "into the 2030s" today at the IAA Mobility show in Munich. It appears Mercedes has found a way around looming Euro 7 emissions ...
titleSummary: Mercedes Confirms V12 Lives On for Now
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz CEO Thomas Schäfer hinted at an important announcement, but remained tight-lipped about specifics. At the IAA Mobility show, the automaker confirmed it will continue producing its powerful V12 engine until at least the 2030s, potentially circumventing looming Euro 7 emissions regulations.

title: New Chinese Concept Debuts as a Rolls-Royce-Sized Luxury Sedan
description: Chinese luxury brand Avatr used this week's IAA Mobility Show in Munich to unleash a lavish concept car. Called the Vision Xpectra, it's not destined for production but does help show off the prowess of Avatr's European design studio, while potentially providing some hints at the brand's future ...
titleSummary: China's Pinnacle of Opulence Hits the Road in Ultra-Luxury Vehicle Debut
descriptionSummary: At this year's IAA Mobility Show, Chinese luxury marque Avatr unveiled an extravagant concept vehicle that showcases the talents of its European design team and may offer a glimpse into the brand's long-term vision.

title: VW Admits Defeat: New ID.4 Will Have Physical Controls and 'Completely Different' Design
description: Volkswagen unveiled its future electric vehicle direction at IAA Mobility 2025, showcasing the ID. Cross Concept that will inspire upcoming models. CEO Thomas Schäfer announced the company's goal to lead high-volume EV manufacturing with cutting-edge technology by 2030, with the completely revamped ...
titleSummary: "Volkswagen Shifts Gears: Back to Basics for the Electric ID.4 Overhaul"
descriptionSummary: At IAA Mobility 2025, Volkswagen revealed its electrified roadmap, introducing the innovative ID. Cross Concept as a harbinger of things to come. CEO Thomas Schäfer outlined ambitious plans for high-volume electric vehicle production by 2030, powered by cutting-edge tech and sleek design revamps.

title: BMW Bets Big: 40 New Models Coming by 2028 With Bold, Unique Designs
description: BMW isn’t slowing down. By 2028, the Bavarian automaker says it will bring more than 40 new or heavily updated models to market, each designed with its own distinct look rather than a cookie-cutter family resemblance. The strategy rides on the launch of the Neue Klasse platform, the flexible ...
titleSummary: "BMW's Ambitious Expansion: 40 Game-Changing Cars to Hit Roads by 2028"
descriptionSummary: BMW is accelerating its product lineup, planning to introduce over 40 new and revamped models by 2028. Each vehicle will showcase unique design, breaking away from a uniform aesthetic in favor of individual character. This shift is driven by the Neue Klasse platform's versatility.

title: Audi RS3 Five-Cylinder Hot Hatch to End in 2026 as EV Era Nears
description: The days of Audi’s raucous five-cylinder engine are numbered. The RS3, the last car in Audi’s lineup to carry the unique 2.5-liter turbocharged unit, has about two years left before stricter European emissions rules force its retirement. For enthusiasts, it is a real gut punch, since the offbeat ...
titleSummary: "5-Pot Fire Dies Down: Last Call for Audi's Fabled RS3 Engine"
descriptionSummary: Audi's iconic five-cylinder engine is nearing its expiration date. With new EU emissions regulations looming, the RS3's potent 2.5-liter turbocharged unit will soon be phased out, leaving fans to bid farewell to this distinctive sound and character.

title: Mercedes’s Baby G Will Be All-New but Still a G-Wagen
description: The idea of a smaller Mercedes-Benz G-Class has been an open secret for the German marque. Often referred to as the "Baby G" or "Mini G," the model is expected to arrive within the next two years as the entry point into an expanding G-Class range. It aligns with Mercedes' intention to evolve "G" ...
titleSummary: New "G" on the Block: Mercedes' Compact G-Class SUV Revealed with Radical Redesign
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz has long hinted at a more compact take on its iconic G-Class, colloquially dubbed the "Baby G." This newcomer is expected to debut within the next two years as an entry-level offering in the expanding G-Class lineup.

title: Dodge Charger Daytona and Jeep Wagoneer S EVs for Rollaway Risk
description: A parking gear is supposed to be the least dramatic part of a car. But Stellantis has discovered that, in some of its newest EVs, it isn’t doing its job. The automaker is recalling a small batch of Dodge Charger Daytona and Jeep Wagoneer S EVs after finding that they could roll away even when ...
titleSummary: "Electric Chargers and Wagoneers Face Recalls Over Spontaneous Gear Shifts"
descriptionSummary: A seemingly mundane aspect of car ownership has taken an unexpected turn for Stellantis, whose latest electric vehicles are experiencing a parking gear malfunction that allows them to roll away unexpectedly. A recall is underway for certain Dodge and Jeep models.

title: 2026 Nissan Z Pays Tribute to Godzilla Legacy
description: After an 18-year production run that saw nearly 48,000 units sold globally, the final Nissan GT-R R35 rolled out of its production plant in Japan last month. It was emotional for enthusiasts, even for Nissan, which released a tribute video for the R35 as the company closes its chapter. Despite ...
titleSummary: "Zilla's Legacy Lives On: Nissan Unveils Reborn Sports Car Inspired by Iconic Beast"
descriptionSummary: The curtain has closed on the iconic Nissan GT-R R35's 18-year run, with nearly 48,000 units sold worldwide before its final departure from Japan's production lines last month. A poignant end to an era, indeed.

title: Honda Prelude’s First Batch Gone in a Flash
description: Once a staple in Honda's lineup throughout the 1980s and 1990s, the Prelude was known for its balanced dynamics and understated styling before bowing out in the early 2000s. Its comeback finally went official last week, both in Japan and the US, when the new coupe was unveiled as a production ...
titleSummary: "Prelude to Chaos: Honda's Sought-After Model Sells Out in Record Time"
descriptionSummary: Honda's iconic Prelude returns after a two-decade hiatus, recalling its reputation for refined performance and unassuming design that defined it as a staple of Honda's lineup from the 80s to early 2000s.

title: Ken Block's Safari-Spec Porsche 911 is Hitting The Auction Block
description: If you are a car enthusiast who grew up during the early emergence of digital and social media, there is a good chance you'd recognize the late Ken Block. He was a legendary driver who inspired a legion of young and young-at-heart automotive enthusiasts worldwide. Whether you first encountered him ...
titleSummary: "Block's Off-Road Beast: Rare Porsche 911 Heads to Auction with a Wild Twist"
descriptionSummary: Car aficionados born into the digital age likely remember Ken Block, a pioneering driver whose electrifying stunts captivated fans globally and ignited a passion for speed in countless young admirers around the world.

title: Mercedes-Benz to Launch 600 kW EV Chargers in America by 2026
description: For years, Tesla has set the pace in public charging with its Supercharger network. The system is not only the most widespread in the United States, but also among the most reliable. At present, the latest V4 Superchargers support up to 325 kW of charging power, enough to give compatible models ...
titleSummary: "Mercedes-Benz Brings Lightning-Fast EV Charging to US Roads by 2026 Deadline"
descriptionSummary: Tesla's pioneering Supercharger network has long dominated public charging in the US, boasting unparalleled breadth and reliability. Its V4 Superchargers now deliver a whopping 325 kW, turbocharging compatible Teslas to near-full charge in no time.

title: New GM Patent Can Tell Elderly Drivers When To Stop Driving
description: Unless you have ridden shotgun with an aging parent, grandparent, friend, or colleague in their golden years, you may have at least pondered how long older drivers should safely commandeer a motor vehicle. Especially in the car-centric United States, driving is more than a means to get around from ...
titleSummary: "Smart Technology Aids Seniors in Knowing When to Hang Up Keys Forever"
descriptionSummary: As people age, concerns arise about when it's safe for them to continue driving, particularly in the US where cars are a vital part of daily life. This issue weighs heavily on family members and caregivers who ride alongside aging loved ones.

title: Hyundai’s $7.6B EV Bet Shaken by Historic Plant Raid and Worker Exodus as 300+ Workers Flown Home
description: This weekend, around 475 people were detained during an immigration raid at Hyundai's massive Georgia Metaplant. Steven Schrank, Special Agent in Charge, Homeland Security Investigations, called it the "largest single site enforcement operation in the history of Homeland Security Investigations." ...

descriptionSummary: In a record-breaking crackdown, over 475 individuals were taken into custody by federal agents during a sweeping immigration raid at Hyundai's sprawling Georgia manufacturing facility.

title: Hyundai's Concept Three Could Be The Answer to America's Compact EV Problem
description: Hyundai just dropped something interesting at IAA Munich 2025, the compact Concept Three. While the Ioniq lineup has been doing great with the midsize Ioniq 5, sleek Ioniq 6, and massive Ioniq 9 SUV, there's been a glaring gap in the compact segment. That's exactly where the Concept Three comes in. ...

descriptionSummary: Hyundai unveiled an exciting new concept at IAA Munich 2025: the compact Concept Three. Filling a notable void in its lineup, this sleek model rounds out Hyundai's electric offerings, which have been gaining momentum with popular models like the Ioniq 5 and 6.

title: The 2026 Polestar 5 Is an 872-HP Super Sedan With 416 Miles of Range
description: The Polestar 5 is to be the brand's new halo car. The automaker initially shot for the stars with the Polestar 1, which was discontinued shortly thereafter. With up to 872 horsepower and up to 350kW of DC fast charging, the electric-only brand finally has a serious performance sedan that serves as ...
titleSummary: Meet the Polestar 5: A 872-HP Speedster with a Surprisingly Long Electric Range
descriptionSummary: Polestar's highly anticipated flagship model, the Polestar 5, is poised to elevate the brand with its exceptional performance credentials, boasting up to 872 horsepower and rapid DC fast charging capabilities.

title: The Lexus IS Isn’t Dead After All — Major 2026 Update Revealed
description: The Lexus IS has long been rumored to be on its last legs, with special edition models interpreted as final runs. Others suggested that the IS line would be discontinued by the end of the year, together with other aging Lexus models, while some reports even speculated that only a single hybrid ...
titleSummary: Lexus Gives Storied IS Sedan a Second Wind with Bold New Chapter Unveiled for '26
descriptionSummary: Rumors have swirled around the fate of the Lexus IS, with speculations suggesting it's nearing its final chapter. Some believe the brand is phasing out the model alongside others, possibly retaining only a limited hybrid offering.

title: From 80% to 38%: Tesla’s Stunning Market Share Collapse in America
description: Tesla is no longer the unstoppable force it once was in the American EV market. The company, which used to dominate more than 80% of sales, has now fallen to 38% in August, according to Cox Automotive figures reported by Reuters. It’s the first time Tesla has dipped below 40% in nearly eight years. ...
titleSummary: Tesla's Meteoric Fall: US Sales Plummet from Dominant 80% to Historic Low.
descriptionSummary: Tesla's electric vehicle dominance is slowly waning in the US market, as its share of sales plummeted to 38% in August, down from over 80% at its peak, according to recent data from Cox Automotive.

title: Lamborghini’s Boldest Car in Decades Faces an Identity Crisis
description: Two years after stunning Monterey with the Lanzador concept, Lamborghini still hasn’t chosen what form the production car will take. Originally billed as the brand’s first pure EV, the 2+2 grand tourer may instead debut as a plug-in hybrid, depending on how the market evolves. Chief Technology ...
titleSummary: "Lamborghini's Rebel Spirit Hits a Roadblock: A Turbocharged Identity Struggle"
descriptionSummary: Lamborghini's Lanzador concept continues to evolve two years after its debut in Monterey, with the Italian marque now considering a plug-in hybrid variant over an initial all-electric offering, pending market conditions and technological advancements.

title: Rivian Software to Turbocharge Audi's EV Lineup Starting 2028
description: Audi CEO Gernot Dollner confirms Rivian tech will debut on two new Audi EVs in 2028.
titleSummary: Audi's Electric Vehicle Portfolio Gets Boost From Strategic Software Partnership
descriptionSummary: Audi's top executive has confirmed that a cutting-edge technology acquired from Rivian will be integrated into the company's lineup, specifically on two upcoming electric vehicles slated for release in 2028.

title: Ford and GM Cheer Trump’s Rollback of EV Rules, Tesla Faces $1B Hit
description: President Trump’s administration has been clear with its goal to cut back emissions regulations and remove tax incentives for electric vehicles, and the moves it has made appear to be a gift to automakers. Deregulation could cut billions in expenditures from automakers’ bottom lines, leading ...
titleSummary: Automakers Rejoice as Trump's Emissions Relaxation Hits Tesla with a Billion-Dollar Bill
descriptionSummary: The Trump administration's deregulatory push aims to slash emission rules and axe EV tax breaks, a boon for car manufacturers that could save them billions by reducing regulatory burdens and boosting profit margins.

title: Rimac Just Unveiled Solid-State Batteries and E-Axles With 8,100 lb-ft of Torque
description: Rimac Technology has used the IAA Mobility show to prove it’s more than a hypercar brand. At Munich, the Croatian company revealed production-ready solid-state battery packs, new hybrid and Evo battery formats, and next-generation e-axles capable of delivering torque figures that sound more like ...
titleSummary: Rimac Reveals Breakthrough Battery Tech with Electrifying New Motor Capability
descriptionSummary: Rimac Technology has showcased its expansion beyond high-performance cars at IAA Mobility, unveiling production-ready solid-state batteries, innovative hybrid and advanced battery technologies, and cutting-edge electric axles with unparalleled torque capabilities.

title: Police Finally Arrest Man Who Drove a Ferrari F1 Car on Public Roads for 6 Years
description: Czech police have finally arrested a 51-year-old man who spent six years driving a legitimate Formula race car on public highways. The Ferrari-liveried race car has been spotted on Czech motorways since 2019, becoming a local legend and every petrolhead's secret hero. Let's be honest, every ...
titleSummary: "Ferrari Frenzy Ends as Driver's Long-Term Road Rampage Comes to a Sudden Stop"
descriptionSummary: A Czech thrill-seeker has finally faced the law after six years of taking his souped-up Formula race car for spins on public roads, earning him local celebrity status among car enthusiasts.

title: New F-150 Lightning STX Brings Off-Road Attitude Without the Price Hike
description: We’ve been hearing rumors of a Ford F-150 Lightning Raptor for a while now, but the automaker hasn’t made any moves that suggest a new model is coming. While we wait, Ford came up with the F-150 Lightning STX, which offers unique styling, all-terrain tires, and off-road accents. Like the Lightning ...
titleSummary: "Ford's Budget-Friendly F-150 Lightning Model Tackles Tough Terrain with Ease"
descriptionSummary: Rumors of an F-150 Lightning Raptor have been circulating for some time, but no official announcement has been made by Ford. Meanwhile, a new variant called the STX model has emerged, boasting distinctive design cues, rugged tires, and off-road enhancements reminiscent of its Raptor counterpart.

title: Glowing Grille, 500-Mile Range: Mercedes Teases the Electric C-Class
description: Mercedes-Benz has previewed the next evolution of its best-selling sedan: an all-electric C-Class. Revealed in a shadowy teaser at the Munich Motor Show, the EV blends traditional proportions with futuristic details, including a glowing LED grille. With nearly 500 miles of range promised, Mercedes ...

descriptionSummary: At the Munich Motor Show, Mercedes-Benz unveiled a glimpse into the future of its beloved C-Class sedan, reinvented as an all-electric marvel that seamlessly merges classic style with avant-garde touches and an impressive estimated range of over 400 miles.

title: Ultra-Low Mileage BMW M3 Lime Rock Park Edition Heads to Auction
description: BMW has produced many iconic M3s, but the E92-generation holds a unique place in the brand’s history. It was the only M3 powered by a naturally aspirated V8, and for its final year in 2013, BMW released a special edition known as the Lime Rock Park Edition. Limited to just 200 units for the US ...

descriptionSummary: The E92-generation BMW M3 stands out for being the last of its kind with a naturally aspirated V8 engine. To commemorate its departure from production in 2013, a exclusive Lime Rock Park special edition was created, with only 200 units allocated for the American market.

title: Mercedes’ Cheapest SUV in America Gets a Redesign for 2026
description: For years, the GLA-Class has been the smallest and most affordable way into Mercedes-Benz ownership in America. It has served as the brand’s entry point, appealing to first-time luxury buyers who want the badge without stretching into larger and pricier models. But the current version – first ...

descriptionSummary: The Mercedes-Benz GLA-Class has long been the gateway to luxury ownership for budget-conscious Americans, offering a stylish and affordable introduction to the brand's prestige without requiring a substantial investment in size or price.

description: Mercedes-Benz drops the all-electric GLC EQ, electrifying its best-selling GLC 400 4Matic as the iconic style meets next-level tech.
titleSummary: "Mercedes Unveils Pioneering Electric SUV with Record-Breaking Power and Sustainable Luxury Features"
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz has electrified its popular GLC model by introducing an all-new, battery-powered version, seamlessly merging sleek design with cutting-edge innovation to create a truly exceptional driving experience.

title: AMG Styling, Geely Badge: Meet the Galaxy Starshine 6 PHEV

From the Landwind X7 that looked suspiciously like a Range Rover Evoque, to Zotye’s Macan impersonation, there’s a long list of “homages” that would make a design lawyer twitch. Things have improved in recent years, but ...
titleSummary: "Galaxy Starshine 6 Hybrid Unveiled with Exclusive Luxury Touches and Eco-Friendly Twist"
descriptionSummary: Chinese carmakers have struggled with striking a balance between creativity and copying the global automotive giants. While some "inspired" designs still raise eyebrows, many manufacturers are now shifting towards more authentic and original styles.

title: Mazda CX-90 Gets More Expensive for 2026 — Time to Shop 2025 Models?
description: The Mazda CX-90 holds a special place in the brand’s lineup as its biggest SUV, offering three rows of seating and a focus on balancing family practicality with Mazda’s familiar driver-focused engineering. While it is not Mazda’s top-selling product, the CX-90 has been gaining traction. During the ...
titleSummary: "Price Hike Hits Mazda CX-90 for 2026 – Is a 2025 Purchase Still a Smart Deal?"
descriptionSummary: The Mazda CX-90 stands out in the brand's lineup as its largest SUV, merging three rows of seating with the signature blend of family-friendly practicality and driving dynamism that Mazda enthusiasts love. Its popularity is on the rise, too.

title: 3 Reasons Why General Motors Is #2 in U.S. Electric Vehicle Sales
description: General Motors (GM) announced this week that its electric vehicle (EV) sales reached a new monthly record in August, with the company selling over 21,000 electric cars from Chevrolet, Cadillac, and GMC. In Q2 2025, GM’s profits took a $1.1 billion hit because of President Trump’s tariffs, but the ...
titleSummary: "Electric Shift: GM's Rise to Second Spot in US EV Market Dominance"
descriptionSummary: General Motors has set a new milestone for its electric vehicle sales, with over 21,000 EVs sold in August from Chevrolet, Cadillac, and GMC brands alone. Despite past trade hurdles, GM's electric push remains on track.

title: Car Brand Loyalty Is Falling Fast: Why More Americans Are Switching Sides
description: If you thought Americans were loyal to their favorite car brands, think again. A new study from S&P Global Mobility reveals that brand loyalty is declining, with only 51.1% of buyers remaining loyal to the same automaker in the first half of 2025. That’s a 1.4-point drop from last year, and ...
titleSummary: "Brand Affection Fades: How American Car Buyers Are Defecting in Record Numbers"
descriptionSummary: American car owners are bucking tradition - a recent study by S&P Global Mobility found that brand loyalty has dipped to just over half, with only 51.1% sticking with their original automaker in the first six months of this year.

title: Why This LaFerrari Is More Than Just a Ferrari Hypercar
description: Ferrari’s LaFerrari belongs to the same family of halo cars as the 288 GTO, F40, F50, and Enzo – each representing a technological and cultural landmark for the brand. Launched at the 2013 Geneva Motor Show, it was Ferrari’s first hybrid hypercar, pairing a 6.3-liter naturally aspirated V12 with an ...
titleSummary: "LaFerrari Raises the Bar: A Rare Breed of Exclusivity and Performance"
descriptionSummary: Ferrari's LaFerrari stands alongside the 288 GTO, F40, and Enzo as a game-changing model that embodies the brand's pursuit of innovation and heritage. Its unveiling at Geneva Motor Show in 2013 marked a milestone in Ferrari's journey, merging a V12 engine with cutting-edge hybrid technology.

description: Limited editions of the Subaru and Toyota sports car twins are coming to Japan—and bringing a burst of sunshine with them. The Subaru BRZ STI Sport Yellow Edition and the Toyota GR86 RZ Yellow Limited both feature Sunrise Yellow paint, accompanied by some cosmetic changes. Both are also limited to ...

descriptionSummary: Two special edition sports cars, the Subaru BRZ STI Sport Yellow and the Toyota GR86 RZ Yellow Limited, are arriving in Japan with a splash of vibrant color and exclusive styling cues, as part of their highly limited production runs.

title: Nearly 92,000 Jeep Grand Cherokee Hybrids Recalled for Sudden Power Loss Risk
description: Chrysler is recalling 91,787 Jeep Grand Cherokee plug-in hybrid SUVs from model years 2022 through 2026 after a safety issue was discovered that could cause the vehicle to suddenly lose power. This recall comes shortly after Stellantis recalled 219,000 Ram and Dodge models. According to the ...
titleSummary: "Jeep Issues Mass Recall of Grand Cherokee Hybrids Over Unexpected Shutdown Threat"
descriptionSummary: A major recall is underway for nearly 92,000 Jeep Grand Cherokees produced from 2022 to 2026 due to a potentially hazardous issue that can cause sudden loss of power. This latest recall follows on the heels of another massive Stellantis safety notice.

title: You Can Still Buy A Rear-Drive BMW X3
description: In 2024, BMW announced that the new X3 would be all-wheel drive only. The rear-drive SUV was dead, and with it, a lower entry point to X3 ownership. However, just across the border, BMW has decided to revive the X3 sDrive in Mexico. For the 2026 model year (and maybe beyond), the X3 20 sDrive is ...
titleSummary: "Rear-Wheel Drive Returns: The Surprising Truth About BMW's X3 Options"
descriptionSummary: BMW has revived its rear-wheel drive X3, a more affordable option for Mexican buyers, with the introduction of the 2026 X3 20i sDrive, bucking a trend established by its all-wheel-drive only lineup in North America.

title: Smart’s Iconic City Car Revival Could Be Its Ford Bronco Moment
description: For years, Smart has been closely associated with Mercedes-Benz as its quirky, urban-minded brand. The company made its mark with the ForTwo, a microcar that became shorthand for efficient city mobility. Over time, however, Smart just made vehicles like everyone else: it shifted away from the niche ...
titleSummary: Smart's Revival Bid Takes a Cue from the Great American Off-Road Comeback
descriptionSummary: Smart's relationship with Mercedes-Benz has been marked by a distinct urban identity since its inception. Its pioneering ForTwo model embodied innovative city transportation, but as the brand evolved, it increasingly blended in with more conventional offerings.

title: This Is What The New Hyundai Tucson Might Look Like
description: The Hyundai Kona is one of the brand's better designs - and one of its better values. The small compact SUV stands out on these two points, and it looks like Hyundai is gearing up to give the updated Tucson a very similar look to the next-generation SUV. This rendering illustrates what we've seen ...
titleSummary: Hyundai Tucson Revamp Unveiled: A Sneak Peek at the SUV's Fresh Facelift
descriptionSummary: The Hyundai Kona has set a high bar for design and value within its class. Its success suggests that future models, such as an updated Tucson, will follow suit with sleek and refined aesthetics. A recent concept gives us a glimpse of what's to come.

title: 1993 Dodge Ram D150 for sale with just 29,000 original miles
description: Pickup trucks have become more comfortable and more capable over the years, but they've also become more complicated. It's hard to find a basic pickup that isn't piled high with tech features and styling details, let alone one in the classic regular-cab, short-bed configuration. Spotted by Barn ...
titleSummary: "Low-Mileage 1993 Dodge Ram D150 Hits the Market for Sale"
descriptionSummary: Today's pickup trucks offer unparalleled comfort and capability, but this increased sophistication comes at a cost - many have become over-accessorized and deviate from traditional designs. A straightforward, no-frills pickup remains elusive, with few manufacturers still offering a simple, classic take on the genre.

title: The Subaru WRX's Sales Are On The Floor: What Subaru Can Do To Change That
description: Subaru has released it August sales numbers and to put it mildly, Subaru WRX sales are distressingly low. Subaru’s best-selling model was once again the Crosstrek, with 20,442 units sold, essentially flat from the 20,396 it moved a year earlier (+0.2%). Year-to-date, the Crosstrek is up 11.5%, ...
titleSummary: "WRX Woes: Subaru Struggles to Boost Limping Performance Car Sales"
descriptionSummary: Subaru's latest sales report reveals a concerning trend for WRX enthusiasts: sluggish demand. Meanwhile, the popular Crosstrek takes the top spot with 20,442 units sold, narrowly matching last year's figures, and boasting an impressive 11.5% increase year-to-date.

title: The Most Powerful 911 Ever: Meet the New Turbo S
description: The updated 911 Turbo S has been a long time coming. While much of the 911 lineup has already transitioned to the refreshed 992.2 generation, Porsche held back its flagship model – until today. After a tasteful teasing last week, the updated 911 Turbo S has finally been revealed at the IAA ...
